questions.question: How satisfied were you in each of the following areas?

areas.comments: BE VERY Satisfied but I still received my catalog after all. Have NO+ Was our representative this time courteous and polite? Was our representative knowledgeable? Was your question/request handled?

questions.question: Which ONE of the following statements BEST describes the way you feel about R.J. Reynolds' response to your request for assistance?
options: I was neither satisfied nor dissatisfied

questions.question: Based on the service you received, will you continue to purchase the brand of cigarettes you contacted us about?
Based on the service you received, would you recommend this brand of cigarettes to an adult smoker (21 years of age or older) who currently smokes a competitive brand?
